basics.name: Marcin Ostaszewski
basics.label: Front-end Developer
basics.summary: Front-End Developer, working for over 6 years in Scrum/Kanban methodology, with former experience in graphic design, video editing and animation.

keywords: Tools: Jira, Azure, GitHub, Bitbucket, SalesForce
skills.name: Frontend

work.name: Medallia
work.summary: Medallia is in top 5 worldwide companies for Customer Experience
highlights: As a member of an international team of 20+, I am developing an on-site platform for gathering customer surveys.
I am implementing new views and features, fixing bugs, working on-call (Jira, GitHub, Figma).
Developing mainly in React, TypeScript, MobX, Context, StyledComponents, AngularJS, Jest and Jasmine

work.name: Magnetic Point
work.summary: Web development partner with over 20 years on the market, cooperating with various software companies from western Poland
highlights: I was working on various projects, mainly in an international, 20+ persons SCRUM team, for a big British e-commerce company (Jira, InVision)
I was closely cooperating with BEs, UIs and QAs (SalesForce, JS, jQuery, HTML, SASS, Zeplin, Jest)
I was reviewing front-end and occasionally back-end code changes (Azure, Bitbucket, Git)

work.name: AZA Group
work.summary: Fashion e-commerce company from Poland, with branches in several countries of Central Europe, and an internal development team
highlights: I was an efficient member of a 15+ team in a SCRUM / Kanban project (Azure, Teams)
I was improving and refactoring an administrative SPA web app (ReactJS, Redux, TypeScript)
I was developing new features, fixing bugs, doing peer code reviews (JS, SASS, Cake PHP, Azure, Git)

work.name: Marcel SA
work.summary: One of the leaders in software development for laboratories in Poland, with over 30 years of experience and almost 100 employees.
highlights: I improved many features of a web app's UI and graphic design (HTML, CSS, JS, Jinja, AngularJS)
I wrote over a hundred of E2E tests of an AngularJS web app (Selenium Webdriver, JS)
I was developing an internal templating system for medical documentation

work.name: Mashkor
work.summary: Software development team of 5 persons, assembled in Warsaw to realise a project for start-up from Kuwait
highlights: As only front-end dev in team, I implemented user panel, to admininster a database through REST endpoints. (JS, HTML, SAAS, REST, Bootstrap)
Implementing new features almost every week and making weekly client demos (Azure, Git)
